text: Kramer vs. Kramer is a 1979 American drama movie. It was written and directed by Robert Benton. It is based on a novel by Avery Corman. It stars Dustin Hoffman and Meryl Streep as New York City married couple Ted and Joanna Kramer. She leaves him and their son; the couple divorce. Fifteen months later, she decides she wants custody of the child, taking Ted to court. == Other websites == * Category:1979 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American legal movies Category:Best Picture Oscar Category:English- language movies Category:Golden Globe Award winning movies Category:Movies about divorce Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Benton
title: Kramer vs. Kramer
